archimate:Goal.name: Become Capability Oriented
archimate:Goal.documentation:
This is what we need to do according to Michael Lenahan in the Tech Services All-Hands Call 2023-06-01
A "capability oriented" approach focuses on the core abilities and competencies that the organization possesses. These capabilities could be technical skills, processes, technologies, or other assets that the organization can leverage to deliver value to its customers.
